reviews.text: Discreet but helpful staff. Nice restaurant. Great breakfast.
reviews.title: Serene elegant hotel

reviews.text: Rooms are large and very comfortable. Had a corner room and loved all the windows and natural light! Got a nice welcome gift of cookies and fruit.The bathtub is fantastic!!!
reviews.title: Nice and clean hotel @ great location

reviews.text: All public areas as well as rooms are elegantly decorated, very calm,serene and elegant.
reviews.title: New 4 stars hotel in Taipei

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hope I get a chance to stay here again...loved it!!
reviews.title: Simply nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed for 3 nights here, it's a very new hotel, the room is clean, breakfast quality is good and staff are polite and helpful. The location is great which only need 30 seconds walking distance to rail station. The hotel design is simple and we enjoyed to stay in this hotel. We will consider to stay in this hotel again if we go to Taipei next time.
reviews.title: nice hotel
